text: Gienah was the traditional name of two stars, each marking a wing (Arabic al janāħ) of its constellation: * Gamma Corvi aka Gienah Corvi, in Corvus * Epsilon Cygni aka Gienah Cygni, in Cygnus The International Astronomical Union approved the name Gienah for Gamma Corvi A in 2016 and Aljanah for Epsilon Cygni Aa in 2017. ==References==
title: Gienah
